Text:
These Tutorials - Stretch Right from Photoshop CS to Photoshop CS 5.1.Rest assured that the tutorials are workable across versions.

Also remember that Photoshop layout is identical in  Mac and PC. So, don't freak out if the video tutorials are on Mac. In the tutorials, the discrepancies in commands, are pointed out. 

So, just relax and you will be on your way to mastering Brushes in Photoshop.

Keep these tutorials handy, when I start with UL of Photoshop Brushes. ENJOY :)
The "ABR View" Program in this Torrent is the windows version . You may download the Mac version, by following the URL which is provided.
